name: Galacticat (horseplinko)
description:
[This does take a while to unzip, click Player.exe (The icon with the controller) to play the game.       F4 = Fullscreen     F5 = Reset Game]

The rats have hacked into the Cat's spaceship and rigged him to explode!  Can you help him escape before he explodes?  With all his defenses against him, it'll be quite the challenge!
